Class SuperVisory

java.lang.Object
  algorithms.fsa.ver1.SuperVisory

public class SuperVisory
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains methods for supervisory control of discrete event systems.

Author:
Axel Gottlieb Michelsen, Kristian edlund

supC

public static void supC(Automaton plant,
                        Automaton legal,
                        Automaton result)
Finds the supremal controllable sublanguage of a legal language wrt. a given plant

Parameters:
plant - The plant
legal - The legal language
result - An empty automaton to use for the result

controllable

public static boolean controllable(Automaton plant,
                                   Automaton legal)
Checks to see if a given legal language is controllable wrt. a plant

Parameters:
plant - The plant
legal - The legal language
Returns:
The answer to the controllable question

supCProduct

private static void supCProduct(Automaton a,
                                Automaton b,
                                Automaton product)
Computes the accessible product of the two automata a and b for use with the supremal controllable sublanguage. This is made as a special an extra flag is set in the resulting automaton

Parameters:
a - an automaton
b - an automaton
product - the accesible product of a and b.
